languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете странный след на шее серфа: напоминает неглубокий ожог — или очередную заразу с нижних палуб.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы замечаете странный след на шее серфа: напоминает неглубокий ожог — или очередную заразу с нижних палуб.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете странный след на шее серфа: напоминает неглубокий ожог — или очередную заразу с нижних палуб.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the serf's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}
{n}You notice a strange mark on the serf's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}
{n}You notice a strange mark on the serf's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}
{n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}
{n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}
{n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Percibes una marca inusual en el cuello del hombre: parece una quemadura superficial, o quizás sea otro brote de alguna plaga proveniente de las cubiertas inferiores.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Percibes una marca inusual en el cuello del hombre: parece una quemadura superficial, o quizás sea otro brote de alguna plaga proveniente de las cubiertas inferiores.{/n}

languages.text: {n}男の首筋に奇妙な跡があるのに気がついた。表面の火傷か、あるいは下層デッキからの新たな疫病のようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}男の首筋に奇妙な跡があるのに気がついた。表面の火傷か、あるいは下層デッキからの新たな疫病のようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到这个人的脖子上有着古怪的痕迹，看起来像是浅层的烧伤，或是底层甲板的疫病留下的伤痕。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到这个人的脖子上有着古怪的痕迹，看起来像是浅层的烧伤，或是底层甲板的疫病留下的伤痕。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst ein seltsames Mal am Nacken des Mannes, das aussieht wie eine oberflächliche Verbrennung oder eine weitere Pestilenz von den unteren Decks.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst ein seltsames Mal am Nacken des Mannes, das aussieht wie eine oberflächliche Verbrennung oder eine weitere Pestilenz von den unteren Decks.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez une étrange marque sur son cou, peut-être due à une brûlure superficielle ou à un quelconque fléau des ponts inférieurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez une étrange marque sur son cou, peut-être due à une brûlure superficielle ou à un quelconque fléau des ponts inférieurs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Adamın boynunda tuhaf bir işaret olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Yüzeysel bir yanık gibi duruyor. Alt güvertelerde ortaya çıkan bir başka hastalık olması da mümkün.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a strange mark on the man's neck: it looks like a superficial burn, or yet another pestilence from the lower decks.{/n}
